Title: Haohan's Vote IV: Melons For Felons
Description:
All right, now I happen to know that those mountain hozen love a delicious, sweet melon.

Mr. Haohan's last harvest of melons got stolen, so we're going to have to grow some of our own.

Once we have our harvest, we'll use them to lure the nasty hozen's leader out of its cave!
ObjectivesText:
Plant and harvest 4 Striped Melons, then deliver 20 Striped Melons to Farmer Yoon.

Striped Melon Seeds can be purchased from Merchant Greenfield at Halfhill Market. After tilling and tending your plant, you must wait until the next day to harvest ripe Striped Melons.
